name: Magic 8
description:
A short demo made with RPG Maker VX Ace, graphics made with Paint XP. You play as a prophetic avian who is able to answer literally any question with utmost clarity... However, she's only capable of saying "Yes" or "No."

Talk to various characters and answer their questions... Even if you may have some difficulty with a proper response. These characters have a lot to say, so take the time to get to know them!
